full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GTZUG TOR GDUGS DKAR GYI BZLOG BSGYUR MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RGYAL BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020B (CES GTZUG TOR GDUGS DKAR GYI BZLOG BSGYUR GTOR MA DANG 'BREL BA MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, ,DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RIN 'BYUNG GNAS, ,BSKUL BA'I 'DOD MOS LTAR, ,MKHAN MING 'DZIN PA WA G'INDRA SU MA TE PA tU SIDDHIS 'PHAGS MA 'DI'I GTOR MA'I LAS RIM GYI MAN NGAG DANG MI 'GAL ZHING BSKUL BA PO'I 'DOD PA DANG YANG MTHUN PAR KHU RI CHEN MOR BSDEBS PA YI GE PA NI @021A *, ,RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA SHRA MA nA PRA DZNY'A SA GA RA'O, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA RNAMS MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: WA GINDRA SU MA TI PA tU SIDDHI,
